title: NovaOS is now open source.
content:
NovaOS Web changed its license to GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3) by Oct 8 2025.
NovaOS system and NovaOS default apps will be under GPLv3.
Nova Store content will follow respected licenses.
Nova.CSS themes, libraries, contained media will retain their respective licenses.

NovaOS would not accept pull requests.
